item.title: [推薦]少用繼承，多用 composition
item.description: Source https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hxGOiiR9ZKg Summary Inheritance’s cost is expensive when changing requirement, and will need to write methods which your subclass doesn’t needs. Use composition to write more usable code. re-use abstraction inheritance extending parent class composition using interface Unlike extending parent class, interfaces defines only the critical part of the contract, it’s coupling the codes and is adaptable with new requirements.
